description: portrait bust length of man facing right and looking left at viewer; wearing long curly wig; head bald in front; in an oval cartouche with scrolls and vines on a pedestal; at left part of a building with pillars; at right landscape with trees and distant building
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: fiquet s / ISAAC / MOUCHERON / ÉLEVE DE SON PERE | on sheet in pencilL: 2-101
title: Portrait of Isaac Moucheron
